Name: Volt Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu.  Swap a Pikachu Hair and a Pikachu Card for a Volt Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
